name: Minyan Helper
description:
Amazing Jewish adventure game about searching for a Minyan with exciting ways to move around and challenging obstacles!

Kedusha points are added by giving Tzedakah and finding Yidden for the Minyan!

  • Compete for high-score board by adding Kedusha points!
  • Increase Chayus by adding Kedusha points and eating Mezonos!
  • Try to stay out of the water (Esp. if you already went to Mikvah) and don't run out of time!

m5x7 font found in game credited to: Daniel Linssen
